import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import "./Articles.css" function Articles() { const [articles, setArticles] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:3001/api/articles") .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setArticles(data)) }, []) const deleteArticle = async (id) => { if (window.confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this article?")) { await fetch(`http://localhost:3001/api/articles/${id}`, { method: "DELETE", }) setArticles(articles.filter((article) => article.id !== id)) } } return (

Articles

New Article
{articles.map((article) => ( ))}
Title Category Date Actions
{article.title} {article.category} {new Date(article.publishedAt).toLocaleDateString()} Edit
) } export default Articles
